name: MD Hobby and Craft Steel Sheet - Magnet-Friendly Metal Stock
description: This steel sheet offers a magnetic finish that holds magnets. It easy to cut, form and fabricate. Will not rust or corrode. It makes a great, easy DIY project. Easy suggestions are a memo board, spice racks, or schedules.California residents: see Proposition 65 informationEasy to cut, form, and fabricateCan be mounted or adhered to walls, doors, refrigerator, etc.Can be used for roof repair, workbench tops and many other home and shop projectsRecommended for indoor use
